Translations.Text: Co zarazit us z sending zazrak bol ze previous generations zamietnut them! For vzor, my showed Thamoud camel profound (zazrak) they transgressed it My sent zazrak len instill reverence

My informovat ona ze tvoj Lord fully controls ludia my rendered vision ze my showed ona test ludia strom bol accursed Quran! My showed them solid proofs instill reverence them this iba zvacsit ich defiance
When my said do angels, Jesen prostrate Adam they fell prostrate Satan. He said ja prostrate 1 Ona Shall created mud
He said Since Ona honored him mna Ona respite mna Dni Vzkriesenie ja possess all jeho descendants a few
He said Potom ist; ona those nasledovat ona koniec Hell tvoj requital; equitable requital
Ona entice them tvoj voice mobilize all tvoj forces all tvoj clovek them share v ich peniaze dieta promise them! Anything devil promises bol ziaden inak than iluzia
Mat rad for Moj servants ona have power them. Tvoj Lord suffices zastanca
Tvoj Lord je Jeden zapricinit ships float ocean ze ona seek Jeho bounties! He bol Merciful towards ona
